DOC.brief_summary: Urinary retention common problem , particularly hospitalized patient . When Foley catheter remove , patient must monitor urinary retention . The usual method passive void trial catheter remove , bladder fill urine patient monitor void approximately 6 hour . Another option active void trial bladder fill saline catheter remove patient immediately assist void . This study seek determine effect active v passive voiding trial time hospital discharge , rate urinary tract infection , rate urinary retention general hospitalize population .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Active v . Passive Voiding Trials Time Discharge , Urinary Tract Infection , Urinary Retention
DOC.detailed_description: The intervention test active void trial , bladder fill saline catheter remove patient immediately assist void .
DOC.criteria: Admission one three hospital unit University Virginia ( 5 Central , 6 West , Short Stay Unit ) Patient Foley urethral catheter place The physician order Foley urethral catheter discontinue 18 year age old Age less 18 year Prisoners Women pregnant
